highlights: Most central: Rodion Raskolnikov (18), Dmitri Prokofich Razumihin (10), Avdotya Romanovna (9), Nikolay (7)
Key ties: Nastasya-Zossimov (Other), Dmitri-Nikolay (acquaintance), Alyona-Nikolay (acquaintance), Lizaveta-Nikolay (acquaintance), and 1 more
story_summary: Razumihin and Zossimov visit Raskolnikov, who is recovering but still feels depressed. Zossimov examines him and discusses his condition, while Razumihin expresses his plans for a housewarming party, inviting Zossimov and mentioning various guests. The conversation shifts to a recent murder case involving a painter, Nikolay, who is suspected of being involved, prompting Razumihin to express his frustration with the police's handling of the investigation.
